flawed_nl_solution:
Ned has gone up 165 / 11 = <<165/11=15.0>>15.0 flights of stairs.
Thus, he has 20 - 15.0 = <<20-15.0=3.0>>3.0 flights of stairs left to run up.
He will spend 3.0 * 11 = <<3.0*11=33.0>>33.0 seconds running up the remaining stairs to the bomb.
Therefore, he will have 72 - 33.0 = <<72-33.0=39.0>>39.0 seconds to defuse the bomb.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5.0, not 3.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
